title: solla vallAyO
sahitya:
sholla vallAyO kiLiyE sholla nI vallAyO
anupallavi  valla vEl murugan tanai ingu vandu kalandu magizhndu kulAvenru
caraNam 1 tilla ambalattE naTanam sheyyum amarar pirAn avan
shelvat-tirumaghanai ingu vandu shErndu kalandu magizhndiDuvAi enru

   caraNam 2  allik-kuLattarugE oru nAL andip-pozhudinilE angOr
mullai sheDi adanpAr sheida vinai muTrum marandiDak-kaTradennE enru
   caraNam 3  pAlai vanattiDaiyE tanai kaip-paTri naDakkaiyilE tan kai
vElin mishaiyANai vaittu shoonna vindai mozhigaLai cintai sheivAi enru
